meanings.sent1: The group of ballplayers practiced their throws.
meanings.sent2: The ballplayers were excited for the game.
meanings.sent3: The ballplayers decided to have a friendly match.
meanings.sent4: The ballplayers were like stars on the field.
meanings.sent5: The young ballplayers looked up to the coach for guidance.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in ball games.
meanings.sent1: The ballplayers cheered for their teammates.
meanings.sent2: We could hear the laughter of the ballplayers from afar.
meanings.sent3: The ballplayers celebrated their victory with ice cream.
meanings.sent5: The ballplayers' dedication shone through their teamwork.
